articles.title: Man suffers gunshot wound while cycling in restricted forested area near SAF live-firing activity
articles.description: The SAF was conducting a live-firing activity at Nee Soon Range at the time of the incident.
articles.content:
SINGAPORE: A 42-year-old man suffered a gunshot wound on Sunday (Jun 15) while cycling in a forested area near a live-firing activity by the Singapore Armed Forces (SAF).

articles.title: When Beetles See Red
articles.description: Hardly any insects can see the colour red. However, two beetle species from the Mediterranean region are an exception, as an international research
articles.content:
Hardly any insects can see the colour red. However, two beetle species from the Mediterranean region are an exception, as an international research team has discovered.

articles.title: Area with likely Zika Transmission (AZT)
articles.content:
Area with likely Zika Transmission (AZT) is notified when there are positive Zika virus signals in wastewater or mosquito samples detected in the vicinity of a reported Zika case.
To monitor the Zika situation, NEA began conducting wastewater testing... [505 chars]
